<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/e6b9796e0425d604ccf4dd4df2733721/tumblr_inline_myfr5kns4y1rr2wit.jpg"/>* **</p>

<p>* **<iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/a70LD0om6_k" width="420"></iframe></p>

<p>We don’t often post YouTube links during <strong>Twitch Thursdays</strong>, but we figured an exception can be made for <strong>Day[9]</strong>. The famed <strong>Starcraft</strong> personality played <em><strong>KSP</strong> </em>during his day off and streamed his entire experience live on his <a href="http://www.twitch.tv/day9tv"><strong>Twitch channel</strong></a>.*</p>

<p>Thousands of viewers watched <strong>Day[9]</strong> start <em><strong>KSP</strong></em> from scratch, the beginnings of which, you can watch up above. There’s hilarity, there’s some NSFW language and there’s plenty of good times to be had in his currently archived videos.</p>

<p>a70LD0om6_ka70LD0om6_ka70LD0om6_kYou can find out more about <strong>Day[9]</strong> <a href="http://day9.tv/"><strong>here</strong></a>.</p>

"I need practical science to update to [...] rocketry,

but the issue I'm having is getting into space."

- Day[9]

priceless

I had heard of KSP before, but it wasn't until I watched Day[9] play it on his day off that I saw how fun it was.

I'm here because of Day[9]!

But knowing what I know now about the game, watching him play makes me cringe
